lead_paragraph: Missy Franklin will be one of the featured faces of Visa's campaign at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics, replacing fellow swimmer Michael Phelps who is aiming to compete in his final games.

headline.main: Swimmer Missy Franklin Featured in Visa Olympic Campaign
headline.print_headline: Swimmer Missy Franklin Featured in Visa Olympic Campaign
